configurePresets.name: common-ninja
configurePresets.description: Common settings that apply to all Ninja generator-based configuration presets.

configurePresets.name: common-x64-external
configurePresets.description: Settings that apply to all x64 presets which use external architecture setting.

configurePresets.name: common-x64
configurePresets.description: Settings that apply to all x64 presets.

configurePresets.name: common-single-debug
configurePresets.description: Settings that apply to all debug builds that use single-config generators.

configurePresets.name: common-single-release
configurePresets.description: Settings that apply to all release builds that use single-config generators.

configurePresets.name: common-safety
configurePresets.description: Settings that apply to all builds with runtime safety protection features.

configurePresets.name: common-no-safety
configurePresets.description: Settings that apply to all builds with no runtime safety protection features.

configurePresets.name: Ninja-Debug
configurePresets.description: Debug-mode binaries using the Ninja single-config generator, with safety-features enabled.

configurePresets.name: NinjaVS-x64-Debug
configurePresets.description: Debug-mode 64-bit binaries using the Ninja single-config generator, with ASan enabled on executable targets.  Only use in Visual Studio.

configurePresets.name: Ninja-Release
configurePresets.description: Release-mode binaries using the Ninja single-config generator, with no safety features enabled.

configurePresets.name: NinjaVS-x64-Release
configurePresets.description: Release-mode 64-bit binaries using the Ninja single-config generator, with no safety features enabled.  Only use in Visual Studio.
